segments.text: That is the most boring , typical gift in the world !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But this year I want to get him an interesting tie . Like this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not exactly a conversation piece . It's so plain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's perfect ! It's a Dilbert tie !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The diagonal black and red stripes are really conservative though ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But watch this ... it bends upwards , just like Dilbert's tie . There's a wire inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A fly-away tie ! What a riot !
segments.speaker: S1
